title: 5/1/17 - Let's Grade President Trump's First 100 Days
description:
Grading President Trump's First 100 Days ...Callers hand out their grades after the new president's first three months in office ...Planned Parenthood still funded but not the border wall? ......A president Trump loved ...What are Trump's principles?... More grades for President Trump ...Jim DeMint out, Steve Bannon in at The Heritage Foundation? ...Trump says the presidency is harder than he figured and misses his old life? ...Will ANYTHING turn Trump supporters against him? ...What Hillary Clinton's first 100 days would've been like ...How many of his promises has President Trump come through on ...Dwight Eisenhower's Military Industrial Complex speech

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
